results.title: Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report.
results.text_hl: He was discharged on @CHEMICAL_isosorbide_5_mononitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030397 @@@isosorbide mononitrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ therapy and had no recurrence of symptoms during follow-up.

citations.NLM: Wang A, Meir J, Malik A, Fishkin T, Dey S, Panza JA, Haidry S. Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report. Future Cardiol. 2024 Sep 4;():1-6. PMID: 39229652

results.title: Spontaneous Extracranial Internal Carotid Artery Dissection Solely Presenting with Sudden Onset Pulsatile Tinnitus.
results.text_hl: Administration of 5 mg/day @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and 100 mg/day @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ was initiated.

citations.NLM: Okada T, Hamada H, Tanaka S, Yamamoto M, Fujio S, Hanaya R, Arita K. Spontaneous Extracranial Internal Carotid Artery Dissection Solely Presenting with Sudden Onset Pulsatile Tinnitus. NMC Case Rep J. 2025;12():349-354. PMID: 40979076

results.title: Cardiac tamponade and basilar artery aneurysm following leptospirosis: A case report
results.journal: Int J Crit Illn Inj Sci
results.text_hl: DSA showed 50%-70% @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ at the junction of the V3-V4 segments of the vertebral artery.

results.title: Overview of the prospective randomized evaluation of the vascular effects of Norvasc (amlodipine) trial: PREVENT.
results.text_hl: The Prospective Randomized Evaluation of the Vascular Effects of Norvase (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@) Trial (PREVENT) was designed specifically to assess if @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ can be shown to inhibit angiographic progression of lesions 30% or less diameter @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Mancini GB. Overview of the prospective randomized evaluation of the vascular effects of Norvasc (amlodipine) trial: PREVENT. Can J Cardiol. 2000 Jul;16 Suppl D():5D-7D. PMID: 10932029
citations.BibTeX: @article{10932029, title={Overview of the prospective randomized evaluation of the vascular effects of Norvasc (amlodipine) trial: PREVENT.}, author={Mancini GB}, journal={Can J Cardiol}, volume={16 Suppl D}, pages={5D-7D}}

results.title: Effect of antihypertensive agents on cardiovascular events in patients with coronary disease and normal blood pressure: the CAMELOT study: a randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: DESIGN, SETTING, AND PARTICIPANTS: Double-blind, randomized, multicenter, 24-month trial (enrollment April 1999-April 2002) comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ with placebo in 1991 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with angiographically documented @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ (>20% @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ by coronary angiography) and diastolic blood pressure <100 mm Hg.

citations.NLM: Nissen SE, Tuzcu EM, Libby P, Thompson PD, Ghali M, Garza D, Berman L, Shi H, Buebendorf E, Topol EJ, CAMELOT Investigators. Effect of antihypertensive agents on cardiovascular events in patients with coronary disease and normal blood pressure: the CAMELOT study: a randomized controlled trial. JAMA. 2004 Nov 10;292(18):2217-25. PMID: 15536108
citations.BibTeX: @article{15536108, title={Effect of antihypertensive agents on cardiovascular events in patients with coronary disease and normal blood pressure: the CAMELOT study: a randomized controlled trial.}, author={Nissen SE and Tuzcu EM and Libby P and Thompson PD and Ghali M and Garza D and Berman L and Shi H and Buebendorf E and Topol EJ and CAMELOT Investigators}, journal={JAMA}, volume={292}, number={18}, pages={2217-25}}
